content.title: UI for Edit Recipient
content.body:
1. From the bottom left panel of Iris, navigate to Default Library.
  2. Next to the Default Library, you will see the tab for My Libraries and a search icon.
    Click the search icon.
  3. In the search bar that appears, enter EditRecipient.
  4. From the RecipientsWeb, select EditRecipient and drop it onto frmEditRecipient form on the canvas.
  5. On the Resolved Conflicts dialog box, click Close.
